title: Schedule Staff for an Event
description: An operations manager needs to schedule ushers, ticket takers, and security for an upcoming concert.

tasks.description: Determine the required staffing levels based on the event's expected attendance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines that 40 ushers, 20 ticket takers, and 30 security guards are needed.

tasks.description: Create shifts in the scheduling system for each role.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the required shifts with correct start and end times.

tasks.description: Send a notification to all qualified staff members about the available shifts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent broadcasts the shift availability to the staff pool.

tasks.description: Monitor the shift sign-ups and manually assign staff if needed to fill all roles.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures all shifts are filled before the day of the event.
